'''''Parma Eldalamberon 8''''' is the eighth issue of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'', a journal of linguistic studies of the Elvish languages and names in the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{PEnav|7|9}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Ainulindale" — Adam Christensen

* Articles
** "The Unified Field Theory of Elvish" — [[Patrick H. Wynne]]
** "Pronouns in ''Noldorin'' and ''Sindarin''" — [[Tom Loback]]
** "''Itarille Quete''" — translated by Craig Marnock
** "A Survey of ''Eldarin'' Pronouns" — [[Bill Welden]]
** "23 and 31: Problematic Numbers in Elvish" — [[Arden R. Smith]]
** "''Hoth, Hothri, Hothron:'' Orc Military Organization and Language" — Tom Loback
** "An Excruciatingly Thorough Analysis of ''Fíriel's Song''" — Patrick H. Wynne

* Runes: Letters to ''Parma''
* Back cover: "[[:File:Parma Eldalamberon 8 (back cover).png|Business as usual in Mordor]]" — Patrick Wynne

==External links==
* [http://www.eldalamberon.com/parma8.html Official product] on Eldalamberon.com (currently unavailable)
